name: WatchOutt!
description:
Keep moving to survive!

It is not the final version, so you might feel weird while playing. 

Sorry about that! 

I will try to fix that as soon as possible.

Pree Space to quit the game

4 levels in total 

Level 1:

15 seconds

There are random flying objects 

Level2:

20 seconds

There are randomly flying objects

New randomly generated areas will appear, which have attractions. For the player, they will be attracted and trapped in those areas if they are close enough. But for those flying objects, they will also be attracted, but they will not be trapped 

Level 3:

20 seconds

With all of the objects and effects from the past levels

"Enemy" appears, it will have a shrinking effect

Another object appears, which will increase the player's health value if they successfully collect it.
